title: OCE PBE
body:
This is probably a stupid question as i can imagine its been asked before, but really i dont care and cant find anything on it xD so
Why doesnt OCE server have PBE??
or am i a tool and it does? lol

cheers summoners
Villain

replies.body: Because PBE is it's own server, and dev happens in central, you the PBE server needs to have low latency and be on hand for the dev teams.
